name: Mistwood
description:
Bring back, what long was lost; bring back whatever it costs.

Mistwood is a first-person adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a nebulous being who finds himself in a dying forest. It has the ability to absorb energy from animals and humans, but this leads to their petrification. The player encounters a young shaman who is inexplicably immune to this deadly ability. She tries to fathom the mystery of the forest, because the fog is getting closer and closer to her village.

Mistwood, a Bachelor Project form Manuel Arabadzic and Myriel Schigiol
